unpair.title: Unpair
unpair.confirmAlertMessage: Are you sure you want to unpair?
unpair.warningTitle: Are you sure you want to unpair?
unpair.warningText:
Unpairing will disconnect you from your partner,
and some data may become inaccessible.
unpair.recoveryHint: Data can be recovered within 30 days
unpair.warning1: Your partner will be notified of the disconnection
unpair.warning2: Mission history is kept in individual accounts
unpair.warning3: You can reconnect with the same partner within 30 days
unpair.finalConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to unpair?
This action cannot be undone.
unpair.successMessage:
You have been unpaired.
Reconnect with the same partner within 30 days to recover your data.
unpair.notificationBody: {{nickname}} has unpaired from you. Reconnect within 30 days to recover your data.
unpair.partnerDisconnectedMessage:
Your partner has disconnected the pairing.
You can connect with a new partner or reconnect with the same partner within 30 days.
unpair.partnerDeletedAccountMessage:
Your partner has deleted their account and the pairing has been terminated.
Reconnection is not possible, and previous memories and data cannot be recovered.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.confirmAlertMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
deleteAccount.dataList: Data to be deleted: Profile information, Couple connection info, Completed mission records, Albums and photos, All settings
deleteAccount.finalConfirmMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?
All data will be permanently deleted.
deleteAccount.successMessage:
All data has been deleted.
Thank you for using our service.
deleteAccount.error: An error occurred while deleting your account.

premium.title: Premium
premium.subtitle: Premium for more special dates
premium.heroSubtitle: Enjoy more special dates with your partner
premium.paymentNotice1: Payment will be charged to your App Store or Google Play account upon confirmation.
premium.paymentNotice2: Subscription automatically renews unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period.
premium.paymentNotice3: You can cancel anytime in your device's subscription settings.
premium.paymentNotice4: By proceeding with payment, you agree to the payment terms.
premium.refundNotice1: Refunds are processed according to App Store or Google Play policies.
premium.refundNotice2: After cancellation, you can continue using Premium benefits until the end of the current billing period.
premium.refundNotice3: Refunds are not available after using premium features.
premium.importantNotice1: When one person subscribes, both you and your connected partner can enjoy Premium.
premium.importantNotice2: Your subscription will not be automatically canceled when you unpair or delete your account. Please cancel it yourself if you don't want to continue.
premium.importantNotice3: When you connect with a new partner while subscribed, you can continue to use Premium features.
premium.coupleNotice: When you subscribe, your paired partner also gets Premium benefits.
premium.restoreSuccessMessage: Your purchase has been restored successfully.
premium.restoreFailedMessage: No previous purchases found. If you believe this is an error, please contact support.
premium.purchaseError: An error occurred during purchase. Please try again later.
premium.restoreNotice1: If you switched to a new device or reinstalled the app, tap Restore Purchase to recover your previous subscription.
premium.restoreNotice2: Subscriptions are tied to your Apple ID or Google Account and can be used on multiple devices.
premium.partnerPremiumNote: You're enjoying benefits from your partner's premium subscription
premium.legalText: Subscription belongs to the paying account, and your paired partner also enjoys premium benefits. You can cancel your subscription directly in the App Store or Google Play, and you can continue using it until the end of the paid period. Subscription is not automatically canceled when unpairing or deleting your account.

deleteWarning.title: Subscription Notice
